mazeGenerator

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazeGenerator.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Cell is the basic entity a maze consists of.A cell represents one square field in the grid that later forms a maze. A cell has up to four neighbours, * meaning diagonally adjacent cells are not considered neighbours (von Neumann neighbourhood).
    Author:
    AmazingGroup
